backend/main.mo: Manages presale state, tracks contributions and allocations, enforces presale cap, and exposes query and update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping audio playback features to related source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of all frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme definitions with custom color variables and dark mode overrides.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling all presale sections and rendering the background music controller.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundMusic/: Floating UI for controlling background music with play, mute, volume slider, and error display.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer showing copyright and a referral link with dynamic UTM content.
frontend/src/components/presale/Contribu: Fetches, aggregates, and displays contributors in a styled table with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/components/presale/Countdow: Shows a 24‑hour countdown using values from useCountdown24h.
frontend/src/components/presale/DepositA: Displays the presale deposit address with copy-to-clipboard feedback.
frontend/src/components/presale/HeroSect: Displays the presale hero section with an animated image, headline, tagline, and feature cards.
frontend/src/components/presale/HowToCon: Explains how to join the presale with step-by-step instructions and key presale info.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleP: Shows live presale progress including percentage, ICP stats, and an ended badge using presale status data.
frontend/src/components/presale/PresaleS: Wraps countdown, presale parameters, progress, and deposit address into a single status section.
frontend/src/components/presale/Tokenomi: Presents tokenomics details and a FAQ section for the IcpMemeDoge presale.
frontend/src/constants/presale.ts: Defines presale constants like deposit address, cap, max supply, and polling interval.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useBackgroundMusic.ts: Manages background music playback with volume, mute state, autoplay handling, and user interaction unblocking.
frontend/src/hooks/useContributors.ts: Fetches and polls the list of presale contributors using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountdown24h.ts: Provides a 24-hour countdown timer with hours, minutes, and seconds remaining.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login flow, identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePresaleStatus.ts: Fetches presale status from the backend actor using React Query with polling and conditional enabling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom neon-themed utilities, animations, and color variables for the app’s visual theme.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/backgroundMusicStorag: Handles loading, saving, and validating user preferences for background music and opt‑in state via localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/contributors.ts: Aggregates contribution records by address, computing totals, counts, and latest timestamps.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Formats ICP numbers using German locale thousands separators with no decimal places.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, radii, animations, and plugins to support the neon aesthetic.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project goals, architecture notes, issues, and implemented features for the presale website.
